## Checklist

- [ ] Formula builds successfully: `brew install --build-from-source <formula>`
- [ ] Formula passes audit: `brew audit --strict <formula>`
- [ ] Tests pass: `brew test <formula>`
- [ ] Livecheck works (if applicable): `brew livecheck <formula>`
